meanings.sent1: She had the pockiest face in the whole village.
meanings.sent2: The moon was the pockiest it had ever been that night.
meanings.sent3: The pockiest cat in the neighborhood always found a sunny spot to nap.
meanings.sent4: The old tree had the pockiest bark, full of holes and crevices.
meanings.sent5: The pockiest rock on the beach was a favorite among collectors for its unique markings.

meanings.sent1: It was the pockiest dessert she had ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: The pockiest candy in the jar was the first to be eaten.
meanings.sent3: The pockiest flower in the garden attracted the most bees.
meanings.sent4: The pockiest sweater she owned was her favorite for cold days.
meanings.sent5: The pockiest cloud in the sky looked like a fluffy pillow floating above.

meanings.sent1: The pockiest fabric felt rough against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The pockiest texture of the wall made it difficult to clean.
meanings.sent3: The pockiest fruit in the basket was surprisingly sweet.
meanings.sent4: The pockiest sound echoed through the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The pockiest scent in the room reminded her of childhood memories.
